channel.description: Recent content in iot on Automate attention

item.title: Sniffing water out of thin air
item.description: I don’t like having to relying on other peoples computers, aka the cloud, so when I can I selfhost the tools and services I need. But sometimes there isn’t a service to selfhost. This was the case with my mysterious smart water meter which is now enforced by my municipality. After some research I found out that I might be able to get to my precious water data by using a radio dongle.
